org.teatrove.trove.file
Interface FileRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
MultiplexFileRepository
public interface FileRepository

Allows files to be created with automatically assigned identifiers. Files should not be opened or deleted unless the identifier was returned by createFile.

Author:
Brian S O'Neill

Nested Class Summary
static interface FileRepository.Iterator

lock

ReadWriteLock lock()
Lock access to FileRepository methods. Use of this lock does not restrict operations on open FileBuffers.

When only a read lock is held, no files may be created or deleted. When an upgradable lock is held, only the owner thread can create or delete files. When a write lock is held, all operations are suspended except for the owner thread.
